description:
Ensure your feet stay happy while trekking around the world. The Banks is built tough to handle heavy loads and rough or wet terrain, with a supportive midsole that cushions each step. This Straight Fit-Extra version is designed with additional room at the sides of the forefoot and around the big toe, reducing rubbing at the front sides of hikers with wider feet.

  • Leather Working Group certified suede and fabric upper
  • Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment
  • Gore-Tex waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry and comfortable in all weather conditions
  • Spacious forefoot area suits hikers with wider feet
  • Cushioning midsole with reinforced polyurethane wedge for smooth roll-off and shock absorption
  • Vibram® Endurance Pro rubber outsole provides traction in rough terrain
name: Hanwag Banks SF Extra Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
